title: Ensure updates, patches, and additional security software are installed
description: Periodically patches are released for included software either due to security flaws or to include additional functionality.
rationale: Newer patches may contain security enhancements that would not be available through the latest full update. As a result, it is recommended that the latest software patches be used to take advantage of the latest functionality. As with any software installation, organizations need to determine if a given update meets their requirements and verify the compatibility and supportability of any additional software against the update revision that is selected.
remediation: Run the following command to update all packages following local site policy guidance on applying updates and patches: apt update && apt upgrade (or apt dist-upgrade)

additional_info.testing_period: Site policy may mandate a testing period before installation onto production systems for available updates.
additional_info.upgrade_command: Used to install the newest versions of all packages currently installed on the system. Packages currently installed with new versions available are retrieved and upgraded; under no circumstances are currently installed packages removed.
additional_info.dist_upgrade_command: In addition to performing the function of upgrade, also intelligently handles changing dependencies with new versions of packages. The dist-upgrade command may remove some packages if necessary.

cis_controls_v8.title: Perform Automated Operating System Patch Management
cis_controls_v8.description: Perform operating system updates on enterprise assets through automated patch management on a monthly, or more frequent, basis.

cis_controls_v8.title: Perform Automated Application Patch Management
cis_controls_v8.description: Perform application updates on enterprise assets through automated patch management on a monthly, or more frequent, basis.

cis_controls_v7.title: Deploy Automated Operating System Patch Management Tools
cis_controls_v7.description: Deploy automated software update tools in order to ensure that the operating systems are running the most recent security updates provided by the software vendor.

cis_controls_v7.title: Deploy Automated Software Patch Management Tools
cis_controls_v7.description: Deploy automated software update tools in order to ensure that third-party software on all systems is running the most recent security updates provided by the software vendor.

notes: Organizations need to determine if a given update meets their requirements
Verify the compatibility and supportability of any additional software
Site policy may mandate a testing period before installation
Reboot may be required after kernel or init system updates
